reviews.review_msg: Simplifies everything you need to know and makes everything super clear. Gives lots of examples from the lecture that relate to the homework, which relate very closely with the midterms. Final was a bit harder but still fair. Didn't need to look at the test at all. Amazing prof.
Favorite prof ever, I absolutely loved her class! I wish she could teach every single one of my courses.

Brenda is an amazing prof! Her notes are very clear and tests are pretty straightforward if you do all the homework that she assigns and make sure you go to her office hours. She is super approachable and actually makes math kind of enjoyable. I definitely recommend taking this class with her.
